ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Magnificent!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Glorify, then, (O Prophet), the name of your Great Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), glorify your Lord, the Great One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor (O Muhammad), praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So celebrate the Name of your Lord, the All-supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So glorify the Name of your Great Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:74] So glorify, exalt the transcendence [of], the Name (ism is extra) of your Lord, the Tremendous, God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore (0 Muhammad), praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous) therefore pray in the name of your Lord, the Mighty; it is also said that this means: remember the divine Oneness of your Lord, the Mighty.
